original_text: You will forget about your trouble. It will be like water that has disappeared. You will not remember it. You will forget about your trouble.
korean_text: 곧 네 환난을 잊을 것이라 네가 기억할지라도 물이 흘러감 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will forget about your trouble.
It will be like water that has disappeared.
You will forget about your trouble.
